definitions.definition: Outside, externally. This is still used in the names of some civil parishes in England, e.g. St Cuthbert Without.

definitions.example: Being from a large, poor family, he learned to live without.

definitions.definition: In prostitution: without a condom being worn.

definitions.example: The snow was swirling without the cottage, but it was warm within.

definitions.definition: Not having, containing, characteristic of, etc.
definitions.example: It was a mistake to leave my house without a coat.

definitions.definition: Not doing or not having done something.
definitions.example: He likes to eat everything without sharing.
